overview_of_class: Turkish 111-3 is the final part of the three-quarter introductory course in modern Turkish. It is open to both undergraduate and graduate students. Successful completion of Turkish 111-2 or equivalent is required. This course aims to introduce students to the essential points of modern Turkish grammar and vocabulary to develop basic reading, writing, speaking and listening skills. The course also provides insights into modern Turkish culture through the language. With this in mind, the textbook is supplemented by additional printed and audio-visual materials provided by the instructor.
name: Turkish I
subject: TURKISH
